Authorizing the printing of a revised and updated version of the House document entitled "Women in Congress, 1917-2006".
Authorizing the printing of a revised and updated version of the House document entitled Women in Congress, 1917â€“2006.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.
Mrs. Davis (CA) asked unanimous consent to discharge from committee and consider.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: This concurrent resolution requires the printing of a revised and updated version of House Document 108-223, titled Women in Congress, 1917-2006.
